channel.title: DivergenceX Looking for Coders
channel.description: Hi, We are a Brand New Server Starting up, Calling us Self DivergenceX. We got so far a source / client, but needs a few fixes before we think we will go live. Therefore i would like to hire some coders Wich will be considered a job and therefor rewarded. : What i need is The Following: CONTACT: gamingprofile@live.dk or Skype - Jeppeodk or - GMAIL Kalynayos@gmail.com Working Woodcutting Working Smithing Donation System (with Items, Points; and Claim Command ::redeem We have remote MYsql, Webhost and site... and stabile VPS READY for launch we are testing 24/7 also i need to get Coded Dragon Claws into server but should not be that hard. All this is [PI] Based. and 317 with 474 Sprites. Godsword / Dbow works, with real Specs same with onyx bolts (e) and rune C bow then we need to do so that when u donate for status you're "Character file" gets the status" but the problem is. we have 2 servers, and need this to be done on both.. not all fixes but all with donor thing. please WILL BE PAYED GOOD OFF. Blessings Saphira, [PS: DIdent know wich forum was right]

item.title: DivergenceX Looking for Coders
item.dc:creator: @Saphira_DK1 Saphira DK
item.description:
@Saphira_DK1 wrote:

Hi, We are a Brand New Server Starting up, Calling us Self DivergenceX.
We got so far a source / client, but needs a few fixes before we think we will go live.
Therefore i would like to hire some coders Wich will be considered a job and therefor rewarded.
: What i need is The Following:
CONTACT: gamingprofile@live.dk or Skype - Jeppeodk or - GMAIL
Kalynayos@gmail.com
Working Woodcutting
Working Smithing
Donation System (with Items, Points; and Claim Command ::redeem
We have remote MYsql, Webhost and site… and stabile VPS READY for launch
we are testing 24/7
also i need to get Coded Dragon Claws into server but should not be that hard. All this is [PI] Based. and
317 with 474 Sprites. Godsword / Dbow works, with real Specs same with onyx bolts (e) and rune C bow
then we need to do so that when u donate for status you’re “Character file” gets the status"
but the problem is. we have 2 servers, and need this to be done on both… not all fixes but all with donor thing. please
WILL BE PAYED GOOD OFF. Blessings Saphira, [PS: DIdent know wich forum was right]

Read full topic
